Dear Gaby,

 

As per our records, the following documents for your unit in DMM have either expired or have not been submitted.

 

Please share the valid copies of the documents by today to avoid operational disruptions for permit approvals.

1.	Fire Alarm AMC
2.	Fire Fighting AMC
3.	Roller Shutter AMC
4.	Business Interruption Insurance
5.	Public Liability Insurance
6.	Plate Glass Insurance
7.	Property All Risk Insurance
8.	Workmen’s Compensation & Employers Liability Insurance

From: Sheryl Lyn Balles Bernardo <SBalles@emaar.ae <mailto:SBalles@emaar.ae> > 
Sent: Thursday, January 2, 2025 8:40 AM
Cc: Ausyvieree Macanlalay Benito <ABenito@emaar.ae <mailto:ABenito@emaar.ae> >
Subject: DMM & MR - Trade License, AMC & Insurance Documents Update
Importance: High

 

Dear Valued Retailers,

Happy New Year.

In accordance with your Lease Agreement, please provide us with valid copies of the following documents to ensure our records are up to date:

1.	Trade License
2.	Business Interruption Insurance
3.	Public Liability Insurance
4.	Plate Glass Insurance
5.	Property All Risk Insurance
6.	Workmen’s Compensation & Employers Liability Insurance
7.	Fire Alarm AMC
8.	Fire Fighting AMC
9.	Pest Control AMC (as per Emaar approved list of service providers – Memo 1714)
10.	Kitchen Exhaust Cleaning AMC (only applicable to F&B unit)

Further to Memo 1729 issued previously, kindly ensure the Trade License and Insurance copies are also uploaded into the Tenant Portal.  If you are encountering issues uploading the documents, please let us know. In the meantime, kindly send the copies directly via email so we can update our records.

     

We appreciate your prompt response and compliance.

 

 

Best regards,

 

Sheryl Balles-Bernardo

 



  

Dubai Marina Mall & Marina Retail 

  

T +97144361059

 

emaar.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/akn8CE6noUg9E4YFNf7c7Q6-5?domain=emaar.com/>   

 #DubaiMarinaMall

 

________________________________

From: Sheryl Lyn Balles Bernardo <SBalles@emaar.ae <mailto:SBalles@emaar.ae> > 
Sent: Thursday, January 2, 2025 8:40 AM
Cc: Ausyvieree Macanlalay Benito <ABenito@emaar.ae <mailto:ABenito@emaar.ae> >
Subject: DMM & MR - Trade License, AMC & Insurance Documents Update
Importance: High

 

Dear Valued Retailers,

Happy New Year.

In accordance with your Lease Agreement, please provide us with valid copies of the following documents to ensure our records are up to date:

1.	Trade License
2.	Business Interruption Insurance
3.	Public Liability Insurance
4.	Plate Glass Insurance
5.	Property All Risk Insurance
6.	Workmen’s Compensation & Employers Liability Insurance
7.	Fire Alarm AMC
8.	Fire Fighting AMC
9.	Pest Control AMC (as per Emaar approved list of service providers – Memo 1714)
10.	Kitchen Exhaust Cleaning AMC (only applicable to F&B unit)

Further to Memo 1729 issued previously, kindly ensure the Trade License and Insurance copies are also uploaded into the Tenant Portal.  If you are encountering issues uploading the documents, please let us know. In the meantime, kindly send the copies directly via email so we can update our records.

     

We appreciate your prompt response and compliance.

 

 

Best regards,

 

Sheryl Balles-Bernardo

 



  

Dubai Marina Mall & Marina Retail 

  

T +97144361059

 

emaar.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/akn8CE6noUg9E4YFNf7c7Q6-5?domain=emaar.com/>   

 #DubaiMarinaMall
